items.summary: Add the user-uploaded image `image-4.png` to the frontend static assets at `frontend/public/assets/generated/image-4.png` so it can be referenced by URL at runtime.

Update the app header logo in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader.tsx` to use `/assets/generated/image-4.png`, positioned on the left side of the header, and style it to be medium-sized (smaller than the current `h-16 sm:h-20 md:h-24` sizing) while preserving aspect ratio (`w-auto` + `object-contain`).
